description: General Data Protection Regulation compliance rules

rules.name: Personal Data Collection
rules.description: Check for personal data collection without consent
rules.llm_prompt: Analyze if this document describes collection of personal data without explicit consent mechanisms. Look for data collection practices, consent forms, and privacy notices.

rules.name: Right to Erasure
rules.description: Check for data deletion and right to be forgotten policies
rules.llm_prompt: Check if this document addresses users' right to data deletion and erasure as required by GDPR Article 17.

rules.name: Data Breach Notification
rules.description: Check for data breach notification procedures
rules.llm_prompt: Analyze if this document contains proper data breach notification procedures, including 72-hour notification requirements.
